name: pantry-pal
description: Pantry Pal - Smart Pantry Management System

scripts.dev: npm run check-deps && concurrently -n backend,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.check-deps: test -d pantry-pal-backend/node_modules || (cd pantry-pal-backend && npm install) && test -d pantry-pal-web/node_modules || (cd pantry-pal-web && npm install)
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd pantry-pal-backend && npm install && cd ../pantry-pal-web && npm install && cd ../pantry-pal-mobile && npm install
